sentences.en: A meteorite streaked across the sky.
sentences.cn: 一颗流星划过天空。

sentences.en: A violent streak of pain ripped through her whole body.
sentences.cn: 一阵剧烈的疼痛传遍了她的全身。

sentences.en: He had a reckless, self-destructive streak.
sentences.cn: 他生性鲁莽草率，会做出自毁行为。

sentences.en: He had the ruthless streak necessary to carry him into the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他具有进入内阁所必需的冷酷性格。

sentences.en: He has always had a rebellious streak .
sentences.cn: 他总是有点倔强。

sentences.en: he is off like a streak.
sentences.cn: 他飞快地跑开了。

sentences.en: He'sstill got a mean streak.
sentences.cn: 他这人还是有点损。

sentences.en: His record reveals a tough streak.
sentences.cn: 他的履历显示他性格强悍。

sentences.en: I don't like Kevin — he's got a nasty vindictive streak in him.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢凯文——他报复心太重,叫人讨厌.

sentences.en: On a clear night scores of meteors streak the sky.
sentences.cn: 在晴朗的夜晚,好几十颗流星划破长空.

sentences.en: Paul was someone who certainly had a puritan streak in him.
sentences.cn: 保罗身上无疑带有清教徒气质。

sentences.en: Rain had begun to streak the window-panes.
sentences.cn: 雨水已经开始在窗玻璃上冲出道道条痕。

sentences.en: Rain had begun to streak the windowpanes.
sentences.cn: 雨已开始在窗玻璃上留下条痕。

sentences.en: Sue has blonde streaks in her hair.
sentences.cn: 休的头发里夹杂着几缕金发。

sentences.en: Susan and Deborah share an intensely selfish, egotistic streak.
sentences.cn: 苏珊和德博拉两个人都极端自私和自我。

sentences.en: The sky was streaked yellow and purple.
sentences.cn: 天空被染成一条一条的黄色和紫色。

sentences.en: Their parents had a puritanical streak and didn't approve of dancing.
sentences.cn: 他们的父母管教颇严格，不赞成跳舞。

sentences.en: There was a streak of insanity in the family.
sentences.cn: 这个家族有精神错乱的倾向.

sentences.en: There's a streak of sadism in his nature.
sentences.cn: 他本性中有几分施虐倾向。

sentences.en: We're both alike—there is a streak of madness in us both.
sentences.cn: 我们俩很像——都有点疯。

words.tran_cn: 有条纹的；有斑点的；容易变的；焦躁不安的
在…上加条纹；（闪电等）闪亮；飞跑（streak的过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 超快扫描照相机；超高速扫描摄影机

trans.tran_cn: （与周围有所不同的）条纹，（通常指不好的）特征（倾向），（不断经历成功或失败的）一段时期
trans.tran_en: a coloured line, especially one that is not straight or has been made accidentally
to run or fly somewhere so fast you can hardly be seen
to run or fly somewhere so fast you can hardly be seen
If something streaks a surface, it makes long stripes or marks on the surface
